product.name: Dedicated Enterprise Server
product.description:
+ Processor (max): Dual 6C/6T, 8C/16T, 10C/20T, Intel Xeon Bronze, Silver
+ RAM (max): 3 TB (24 Slots)
+ RAID support: Hardware RAID 0, 1, 10, 5, 50, 6, 60
+ Harddisk (max): 16 x HDD 2.5 inch. Hot-swap
+ Power supply: 2 x Hot-swap power supply, redundant
+ Form factor: 2U Rack
+ Colocation: Netway Data Center

First time order dedicated server at least Quarterly.
*** SPECIAL DISCOUNT ***
Get 5% discount for order Semi-Annually.
Get 10% discount for order Annually.

forms.name: Backup Disk
forms.description: We recommend to split backup data out of the main disk, will be fast and easy when recovery data, increase backup speed and increase IOPS.
